God of WisdomAnswered on 22 Mar 2019https://www.etf.com/etf-education-center/how-do-bond-etfs-work All you need to know.How Do Bond ETFs Track Their Indexes?Traditional bond indexes make great benchmarks, but terrible portfolios. Most equity ETFs hold every security in their index. But that's usually not possible with bonds. Bond indexes often include hundreds, even thousands, of individual securities. Buying up all those bonds for an ETF's portfolio is not only difficult, but expensive. The cost to purchase thousands of bonds in illiquid markets, even those with minimal impact on the index, can quickly erode returns.0 comments0
